LanguageData.LetterBrilliantSuccessMessage: While working, {PAWN_labelShort} recognized a rare opportunity. Guided by {PAWN_possessive} experimental nature, {PAWN_pronoun} took a chance and crafted something truly exceptional.
LanguageData.MessageExplorationSuccess: {PAWN_labelShort}'s experimental attempt successfully increased the item's quality.
LanguageData.MessageExplorationFail: {PAWN_labelShort}'s experimental attempt failed and decreased the item's quality.
